mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name AS userName, u.nickname AS nickname, u.profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, j.job_name AS jobName, m.temperature AS temperature, m.preferred_time AS preferredTime, m.is_active AS isActive, m.price AS price, GROUP_CONCAT(ts.techstack_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS techstackName FROM mentor m JOIN user u ON u.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN job j ON u.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN user_and_techstack ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id LEFT JOIN techstack ts ON ut.techstack_id = ts.techstack_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId} GROUP BY u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url, j.job_name, m.temperature, m.preferred_time, m.is_active, m.price

SELECT p.post_id AS postId, p.title, u.nickname AS author, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN mentor m ON u.user_id = m.user_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT c.column_id AS columnId, c.title, u.nickname AS author, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM `column` c JOIN mentor m ON c.mentor_id = m.mentor_id JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT s.series_id AS seriesId, s.title, u.nickname AS author, s.created_at AS createdAt FROM series s JOIN `column` c ON c.series_id = s.series_id JOIN mentor m ON c.mentor_id = m.mentor_id JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId} GROUP BY s.series_id, s.title, u.nickname, s.created_at ORDER BY MAX(c.created_at) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT r.user_id AS userId, r.rating, r.comment FROM review r JOIN coffeechat c ON r.coffeechat_id = c.coffeechat_id JOIN mentor m ON c.mentor_id = m.mentor_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
